1.1.name: wordpress/lux-vimeo-shortcode
1.1.description:
Allows the user to embed Vimeo movie clips by entering a shortcode ([vimeo ]) into the post area. Vimeo's options regarding the display of meta properties like by-line, title, or the video author's portrait are supported as short code attributes. We built this plugin as a solution for embedding videos on our site. Both conventional Flash-based embedding and native HTML5 video are supported.

Credits

HTML5 embed code contributed by Gabriele Maidecchi. German translation by @talkpress.
